title: Crude oil imports to Canada by region of origin 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in million metric tons for 9 number of Countrys.
The maximum Imports in million metric tons 29.1 is found at Country Total and the minimum is found at Russia where Imports in million metric tons is 0.2.
There is a difference of 28.9 between the maximum Country Total and minimum Country Russia.
